WorkItem.Description:
Vatsim data file is refreshed only cca per 2 minutes, so there is no need to have 30sec and 60sec refresh interval. Moreover, VATSIM server will deny requestes with this timing saying that you are downloading data-file too often.

Can you please add 2 (3, 5) minutes refresh intervals for VATSIM data?

Comments.Message: Mostly correct. However, as the change is easy to accomplish I will do it in the next days.
